publication.title: A Framework for Multi-Core Implementations of Divide and Conquer Algorithms and its Application to the Convex Hull Problem
publication.keyword: Convex Hull;Divide and Conquer;Ease of Use;
publication.abstract: We present a framework for multi-core implementations of divide and conquer algorithms and show its efficiency and ease of use by applying it to the fundamental geo- metric problem of computing the convex hull of a point set. We concentrate on the Quickhull algorithm intro- duced in (2). In general the framework can easily be used for any D&C-algorithm. It

publication.title: Automated casing event detection in persistent video surveillance
Building Social Networks in Persistent Video Surveillance
